name: Jonathan Sahagun
text: Roy , dahil pinahirapan mo kami, I have a slightly upgraded version of your problem for you (and everyone) to figure out:    It is 10 days before a feast. There are 1024 barrels of wine for the feast, but one of them is poisoned. Whoever drinks from that barrel will die after exactly 7 days. You only have eight wine tasters. You have until just before the feast begins to figure out which one is the poison barrel. How will you do it?     :D

source_obj.text: Roy , dahil pinahirapan mo kami, I have a slightly upgraded version of your problem for you (and everyone) to figure out:    It is 10 days before a feast. You have until just before the feast begins to figure out which one is the poison barrel. How will you do it?     :D
